alert.note: Alert for Warren; Washington (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 30 at 3:14PM EDT until August 30 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Warren County in east central New York... Northern Washington County in east central New York... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 314 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hudson Falls, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 3:10 PM, the Glens Falls Mesonet site reported a 58 mph wind gust. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Glens Falls, Hudson Falls, Whitehall, Comstock, Glens Falls North, Huletts Landing, Putnam, Queensbury, Kingsbury, Mount Hope, Wright, Hampton, Fort Ann, South Bay, Chipman Point, Dunham Basin, Smiths Basin, Putnam Station, North Granville and South Bay Village. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
